title: Strengthening E-Learning Practical Competencies: Foundations of Medical Data Management – Online Modular Intensive Short Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and computer literacy
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain systematic management procedures according to standards for collecting, storing, and sharing medical data
Learners can evaluate medical data processing scenarios applying data quality and ethical principles
Learners can complete a real-world case analysis project using a medical data governance framework
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
